The plots in b and d disto affect the susceptible population) and help end the epidemic more quickly28. Healthcare workers are more likely to be exposed and their risk of infection is increased, as supported by reports from China31,32 suggesting that disease amplification in healthcare settings will occur despite restrictive measures.
